name: BTCSwap
description:
BTCSwap is your reliable partner for digital asset trading, providing you with a secure, convenient, and efficient decentralized trading experience anytime, anywhere.

Decentralization: BTCSwap allows you to trade directly with other users without the need to trust intermediaries.
Multi-Chain Support: Supports mainstream cryptocurrencies as well as seamless trading experiences across different rights on bi-chains.
High Liquidity: BTCSwap offers a wide range of digital asset markets, ensuring your orders are quickly matched.
Security Assurance: Utilizes advanced encryption technology to protect your digital assets.
User-Friendly: An intuitive interface makes it easy to manage and trade your digital assets.
release_date: Fri Oct 25 2024 13:30:12 GMT+0800 (中国标准时间)
author: @btcmetaswap
